empresa_x.title: Company X
empresa_x.description: Worked as a fullstack developer on both internal and external projects, using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Developed scalable systems with a focus on performance and automated testing.

inovai.title: Inov.AI
description: Developed solutions in Python focusing on analysis and extraction of legal documents;
Created automations using Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQL Server;
Maintained an internal application built with Angular, Typescript, and ElasticSearch.
